item.description:
The topic of this event is Using NLP To Grow Your Business. We'll talk about how you can benefit from learning about NLP and how to use it to build rapport quickly and easily with prospects and clients.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access here

Date: Thursday, March 21, 2013

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest speaker is Linda Cattelan. Linda is an Executive & Career Coach and the President of Results Catalyst Inc. a professional coaching and training company. Linda is also a Certified Trainer and Master Practitioner of NLP (Neuro Linguistic Programming), and co-author of 2 books, The Power of Women United and Stepping Stones to Success.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the host of the Small Business Success Network.

During this program you will learn:

  • What is NLP?
  • Who could benefit from studying NLP
  • How you can use NLP to get more business
  • Examples of how NLP has helped people in their career and business
  • Simple NLP techniques you can use immediately to build rapport with prospects and clients.

How to Participate

This event is free.

Register here or click the yellow Register Now button to reserve your spot.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

 

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: Using NLP To Grow Your Business
